text: Ezɨ kɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn gari, bizir igharagha garim otifi, ezɨ kɨ bar dɨgavir kuram gami. Kɨ 7plan enselbar gari, me ikia egha 7plan bizir bar kurar gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨzibar suiki. Eghtɨ 7plan bizir kurar kaba gɨvaghtɨ, ua igharaziba otivan kogham, kamaghɨn amizɨ, bizir kurar 7plan kabanangɨn gɨn, Godɨn anɨngagharim bar gɨvagham.
